text:
- CONVERSATIONS ABROAD ~
INTRODUCTION FOR TAPE # 3 — INTERVIEW WITH ITALIAN HOSTESS OF GROUP OF
AMERICAN STUDENTS IN CUNEO^ ITAU.
STATION_ PRESENTS "CONVERSATIONS ABROAD" .A SERIES OF
FIVE TAPE-RECORDED INTERVIEWS WITH STUDENTS, INCLUDING SOME YOUNG AMERICAN
MEN AND WOMEN, WHO TELL US IN THEIR OWN WORDS ABOUT THEIR HOPES, THEIR
STUDIES AND THEIR LIFE IN FRANCE, ITALY AND YUGOSLAVIA. TODAY'S PROGRAM
FEATURES AN INTERVIEW BY OUR INTERNATIONAL HOSTESS, MISS DORIS TROCCHI (TROJ^KE)
WITH DR, iVlARIA FERRARI (FE-RHA'-REE) WHO ARRANGED FOR THE VISIT OF SOME
YOUNG AMERICANS TO CUNEO (KUN»-EH-0), ITALY. AIviONG THIS GROUP WAS A YOUNG
LADY, MISS MARY RANDALL OF LUBBUCK, TEXAS, WHO WAS HER HOME TOWN'S "COMMUNITY
AMBASSADOR" TO ITALY, TODAY'S TAPE RECORDING WAS MADE IN DR, FERRARI'S
APARTMENT, BUT NEVERTHELESS THE SOUNDS OF THE CHURCHBELLS, AND OF THE ITALIAN
MOTOR SCOOTERS OUTSIDE ARE HEARD CLEARLY THREE STORIES ABOVE THE STREET.
